description: by that faithful minister and martyr of Jesus Christ, Mr. Richard Cameron. To which is added, an acrostic upon his name, by a true lover of his memory, and owner of the cause which he sealed with his blood..| On title page : Isaiah xlix. 24 Shall the prey be taken from the mighty, or the lawful captive delivered?| On title page : The sermon was among his last labours, being preached fourteen days before he suffered martyrdom at Airs-Moss.-...
